      • HipoReader

        public HipoReader(java.lang.String directory,
                  java.lang.String runNumber)
        Create Hipo reader and parse a given directory looking for a given run number.
        Parameters:
        directory - directory to parse
        runNumber - run number to look for (use wildcard * to get all run numbers)

                                                                   java.lang.String runNumber)
        Get a list of all hipo files inside a directory and with a given run number
        Parameters:
        directory - directory to parse
        runNumber - run number to look for (use wildcard * to get all run numbers)
        Returns:
        a list of hipo files (absolute path)

      • getNextEvent

        public org.jlab.io.base.DataEvent getNextEvent()
        Get the next event, from the current file if exists, or from the next file
        Returns:

        Open the next file if exists

      • hasNextEvent

        public boolean hasNextEvent()
        Check if the current file has more events or if there are more files
        Returns:
        false is the current event and the current file were the last ones
